animeDescription: The Ninja Pyun Pyun-Maru and his brother Chibi-Maru are working at an office that accepts anything. They solve unexpected happenings caused by other Ninjas. (Source: TOEI Animation Europe catalog)
animeStaff: [['Yamaguchi, Yasuo', 'Episode Director'], ['Tsunoda, Jirou', 'Theme Song Lyrics, Original Creator'], ['Noda, Takuo', 'Key Animation']]
